version.description: The version of the documentation, without a leading 'v'.

typstOfficialDocsUrl.description: The official Typst documentation base URL.

socialLinks.description: Social links to show in the header and footer. The order of items will be the display order.

title.description: A brief title of the social link. If not given, a default title will be generated.

githubRepositoryUrl.description: The GitHub repository URL. Deprecated, please use `socialLinks` instead.

discordServerUrl.description: The Discord server invite URL. Deprecated, please use `socialLinks` instead.

originUrl.description: The origin URL of the deployed site, used for metadata. Note that the base path should not be included.

basePath.description: The base public path for deployment. This must match the value used in typst-docs.

displayTranslationStatus.description: Indicates whether to display the translation status on the site. Community content is always displayed.

socialUrl.description: The social link. For example, a GitHub repository URL, a Discord server invite URL, or a homepage.
